headline.main: PETAIN SPURS STUDY OF SUFFRAGE CURB; Proposes Rule by Hierarchy in New State Framework

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 15 -- Marshal Henri Philippe Petain proposes to frame a new constitution for France in which universal suffrage will give place to a form of hierarchical group representation. This plan, however, is to proceed slowly in preparing the new framework of the State, which would be made operative only after mature study and reflection.
abstract: Petain proposes to Const Comm rule by hierarchy to replace universal suffrage
